Song:
  Tempo: 100
  Kit:
    - bass:   test/sounds/bass_mono_8.wav
    - snare:  [test/sounds/snare_mono_8.wav,]   # Trailing commas are valid in YAML
    - hihat:  [test/sounds/hh_closed_mono_8.wav, test/sounds/hh_open_mono_8.wav,]
  Flow:
    - Verse:  x2
    - Chorus: x2

Verse:
  - hihat:     X...X...
  - [snare,]:  ..X...X.
Chorus:
  - bass:             XXXXXXXX
  - [snare, hihat,]:  .X.X.X.X
